abstract: Why the numbers and the strategy simply don’t work for Microsoft to combine with Yahoo.
snippet: Why the numbers and the strategy simply don’t work for Microsoft to combine with Yahoo.
lead_paragraph: Henry Blodget has a thoughtful post in which he tries to imagine how a combination of Yahoo and Microsoft’s Internet operations might work. His vision is much the same as the one Microsoft and Time Warner considered a year ago for combining MSN and AOL.

headline.main: Microsoft’s Windows Live Yahoo Hotmail Problem
